website_summaries.verdict: The Toshiba Excite 7's poor screen and high price make it an uninspiring choice for an Android tablet.
pros: Bezels make it easy to hold
cons: More expensive than its more powerful competition

customer_reviews.title: Good for the pice
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little faster and a lillte biger. Before this I had an ASUS TRansformer and there's nothing better for now. Some apps on googleplay are not compatible with the device and to make it you have to jailbreake it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it extremely bad support from Toshiba and only last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Demian Ramos

customer_reviews.title: product of very good quality, 100% satisfied with your purchase recommend this ...
customer_reviews.text: product of very good quality, 100% satisfied with your purchase recommend this product to all my friends and customers amazon demanded of such items.
customer_reviews.author: antonio manuel

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a kid but got to play with it a bit first. Was a bit surprised that it came with all documentation and initial settings in Spanish. Had to use Google translate to work my way through the settings to get it changed to english. Once that was accomplished the tablet was great! easy to set up and navigate. Connected to wifi easily and seemed pretty quick. I think it is a nice unit for the price. I also bough myself a Nexus 7 around the same time. Admittedly the Nexus 7 blows this thing away in build quality and speed but it also cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: The_Godfreys

customer_reviews.title: No solutions of software and hardware in web, think it twiece
customer_reviews.text: Well I know spanish and It works really well to me, But it broke down really quickly. And there is none of information outside it webpages to fix any problem either software or hardware. So if you are going to take care of this really well buy it, but if it breaks down, good luck
customer_reviews.author: Enoc.

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet but
customer_reviews.text: Received within shipping estimate. All three tablets were shipped with Spanish user guides. Seller no help. Toshiba site will not allow download of user manual. Tablet always unable to download user manual. Not happy with purchase will be very wary of buying from a third party seller again.
customer_reviews.author: j norrid

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended at all
customer_reviews.text: This tablet never worked. Never turned on. Not recommended at all!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An Excellent Device that does the job and was at a great price. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shahar

customer_reviews.title: Exactly...
customer_reviews.text: what my 9 year old needs. Great for the price...no unnecessary bells and whistles. She absolutely loves her tablet. Weird thing tho, manuals and everything were in Spanish. Won't make a big deal out of that tho.
customer_reviews.author: MJ3

customer_reviews.title: liking it
customer_reviews.text: It has been useful and user friendly no complaints this is my third tablet and better quality than my first one and easier use than my blackberry
customer_reviews.author: william maze

customer_reviews.title: Good price for kids use
customer_reviews.text: Good price for kids use, casing is not as slippery as a lenovo that I prefer better, runs on lower version of android, I cannot install some apps like instagram.
customer_reviews.author: General

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: It seemed fine while it worked. I have called Toshiba, they were supposed to send me return information, and didn't. This was for someone recovering from a brain injury, and it was great while it lasted. I'll have to waste more time on the phone with Toshiba and wait on them to decide what to do.
customer_reviews.author: SDW
